ProjectTitle: Combining CRISPR screening and single-cell RNA sequencing to unravel the mechanisms of T-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/05/2022
4. Documentation and Metadata: Do you use any additional documentation to make the data reusable for yourself and your colleagues during the project e.g. (e)-labbooks,  protocols etc? It's also good practice to already to already familiarize yourself with the metadata needed for deposit and collect this information along with your experiments, for example in a separate sheet in your excel file or in a readme file.
label: good with suggestions
